abilities.name: Æmberbelly
abilities.description: A character may make a :hard: Survival check to open up a freshly slain Æmberdrake and remove two Æmber per :success: and five per :triumph: spent from the check in this way.

abilities.name: Tail Flick
abilities.description: May spend :triumph: on a successful Brawl combat check to inflict one Critical Hit on a vehicle of silhouette 3 or less at medium range.

abilities.name: Æmber Fever
abilities.description: When this character makes or assists a check that involves Æmber, the character making the check may spend :advantage::advantage: to add :success::threat::threat: to the results.

abilities.name: Let's Open the Good Stuff
abilities.description: When assisting on a knowledge skill check, may add additional :boost::boost: to the check; if so, at the end of the encounter the character who made the check recovers 3 fewer strain (to a minimum of 0).

abilities.name: Corrupt Æmber
abilities.description: May spend :threat::threat::threat: or :despair: from any Melee or Brawl check targeting this character to corrupt 1 Æmber the opponent carries (this essentially destroys the Æmber, with other effects as determined by the GM).

abilities.name: Dragged to Doom
abilities.description: May spend a maneuver to pull an immobilized foe within short range to engaged range.

abilities.name: Dubious of Authority
abilities.description: When targeted by a Coercion or Leadership check, may oppose this check with Deception and Cunning (instead of Discipline and Willpower).

abilities.name: Martian Command
abilities.description: As a maneuver, may order up to three allied martians in the encounter to take an immediate out-of-turn maneuver, or to order one allied martian in the encounter to take an immediate out-of-turn action.

abilities.name: Obsessive Customizer
abilities.description: As a maneuver may spend a Story Point to add one of the following item qualities to their pistol or to an outpost weapon with which they are engaged: Accurate 3, Concussive 1, Guide 4, Stun Damage, Sunder. The weapon posses this item quality until the end of this character's next turn.

abilities.name: Here's a Tip
abilities.description: Other characters may spend :triumph: from social skill checks they make targeting this character to add :boost: to other social skill checks they make until the end of the session or until they leave this location.

abilities.name: Inured
abilities.description: Add :setback: to social skill check targeting this character.

abilities.name: Close Ranks
abilities.description: While within short range of another guard minion group, both groups gain 1 melee defense

abilities.name: Force of Justice
abilities.description: Characters within short range of this character add :boost: to their combat checks provided those characters are acting to uphold local laws.

abilities.name: Cyberbyte
abilities.description: After making a combat check, may spend :triumph: to have the target suffer a hit dealing damage equal to the base damage of one powered weapon the target possesses of the cyber rat's choice.

abilities.name: Mischievous
abilities.description: As a maneuver, may distract one character at short range; that character adds :setback: to their next check for each faerie or pixie in that minion group.

abilities.name: Painfully cute
abilities.description: When this character suffers wounds, all characters within short range suffer 2 strain.

abilities.name: Phase
abilities.description: Can ignore terrain penalties and move through solid matter (but cannot end their turn inside solid matter).

abilities.name: Airborne Expertise
abilities.description: May remove :setback::setback: from Operating checks character in the encounter make to control an airship or other flying vehicle.

name: Captain Val Jericho

abilities.name: For the Alliance!
abilities.description: When making a combat skill check, Captain Jericho may spend a to let a member of her crew in the current encounter immediately perform a maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental; she may instead spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: to let up to three crew members in the current encounter perform an immediate action as an out-of-turn incidental.

abilities.name: Heroic Captain
abilities.description: May spend a Story Point to suffer 2 strain and add :triumph: to the next combat or social skill check she makes.

gear: Star Alliance captain's uniform: 1 defense, +1 soak

name: Dodger

abilities.name: Light Fingers
abilities.description: After making a melee combat check, may spend :triumph: to steal one item of encumbrance 1 or less from the target.

abilities.name: Heroic Captain
abilities.description: May spend a Story Point to suffer 2 strain and add :triumph: to the next combat or social skill check she makes.

gear: Dimensional satchel (SotC page 153) filled with all sorts of interesting things.

abilities.name: Friends in Spy Places
abilities.description: A character must suffer 2 strain in order to make a combat check targeting Inka.

abilities.name: Leverage Fame
abilities.description: After making a successful social skill check, this character heals 2 strain and may perform a second maneuver without spending strain (but cannot perform more than two maneuvers in their turn).

abilities.name: Supersonic
abilities.description: After spending two maneuvers to move through the air, as an action may make a :hard: Athletics check; if successful, all other characters within medium range of this character's final location suffer 5 strain.

abilities.name: Sweep Attack
abilities.description: May spend :triumph: on a successful Brawl check to inflict one hit dealing 10 damage on all other characters within short range.

abilities.name: Æmber Eater
abilities.description: After making a successful Brawl combat check, may spend :advantage::advantage: or :triumph: to devour 1 Æmber the target possesses.

abilities.name: Terrifying Appearance
abilities.description: At the start of the encounter, all opponents must make an :hard-1: fear check as an out-of-turn incidental, as per page 243 of the Genesys Core Rulebook; if there are multiple sources of fear in the encounter, opponents only make one fear check against the most fearsome enemy.

weapons.name: Claws
weapons.notes: The difficulty for this check is always :average:

abilities.name: Woodlander
abilities.description: While in a forested area, green walkers upgrade the ability of Cool and Stealth checks they make twice.

weapons.name: Thorny fists
weapons.notes: The difficulty for this check is always :average:

abilities.name: Shift the Pain
abilities.description: When this character heals wounds from itself or another demon character, may choose to have one non-demon character within short range suffer an equal amount of strain; when this character heals a Critical Injury that they or another demon character are currently suffering, may choose to have one non-demon character within short range suffer one Critical Injury.

abilities.name: Fungal Form
abilities.description: Reduce any damage from hits targeting this character by 3 unless the Burn item quality has been activated as a part of this attack.

abilities.name: Powerful Certainty
abilities.description: Whenever this character would inflict strain as the result of a social skill check, the target suffers 2 additional strain.

abilities.name: Someone Looking Over Them
abilities.description: Reduce any damage inflicted on this character by half before applying soak, and reduce any damage inflicted on friendly character within short range by two before applying soak.

name: Pingle

abilities.name: Annoying
abilities.description: Adds :boost: to Coercion checks

abilities.name: Really, Really Annoying
abilities.description: Whenever anyone spends a Story Point during Pingle's turn, one character within short range of Pingle of the GM's choosing suffers 2 strain and becomes staggered until the end of their next turn.

gear: Extra clip of rotten eggs and other foul ammunition
Cybernetic monocle (ignores penalties to Pingle's combat checks due to concealment)

abilities.name: Shift the Pain
abilities.description: When this character heals wounds from itself or another demon character, may choose to have one non-demon character within short range suffer an equal amount of strain; when this character heals a Critical Injury that they or another demon character are currently suffering, may choose to have one non-demon character within short range suffer one Critical Injury.

abilities.name: Feel the Pain
abilities.description: When targeted by a melee combat check, may spend :threat::threat: or :despair: from the results to cause the attacker to suffer 3 strain.

abilities.name: Share the Pain
abilities.description: Whenever this character suffers wounds, one engaged non-demon character suffers half that amount of strain, rounding down.

abilities.name: Feel the Agony
abilities.description: When targeted by a melee combat check, may spend :threat::threat: or :despair: to cause the attacker to suffer 4 strain.

abilities.name: Share the Agony
abilities.description: Whenever this character suffers wounds, one engaged non-demon character suffers half that amount of strain, rounding up.

name: Witch of the eye

abilities.name: Nepenthe Expert
abilities.description: Once per encounter as an action, instead of using its normal effects may ingest a nepenthe seed to either remove 5 strain or ignore the effects of the next failed fear check.

abilities.name: Æffects: Cleansing
abilities.description: As a maneuver or as part of an action using this Æffect may deplete this Æffect to remove all poisons, toxins, and similar afflictions from themself or their target; if used as a maneuver, this power targets one character within short range.

abilities.name: Æffects: Find
abilities.description: May use the effect to locate a particular creature or object at a very great distance, potentially any where on the Crucible. The target must be a being, object, or creature that the Witch personally encountered before. This power gives them an unerring sense of the direction and distance to the target while they are using the power, but not of any intervening obstacles, their surroundings, or other details. If the target does not want to be found (or if someone intentionally hid the object), this should require an opposed Æmbercraft check versus the target's Discipline or Stealth. The process of using the power generally take too long to occur during structure gameplay.

abilities.name: Æffects: Flare
abilities.description: As a maneuver, may use this Æffect to release a blinding flash of psychic light, disorienting all enemy characters within medium range for one round and inflicting one strain on each of them.

gear: World tree leaf garb: 1 defense, +1 soak

name: Witch of the wilds

abilities.name: Ease of the Wilds
abilities.description: When a character within short range of this character removes strain at the end of an encounter, that character and this character both remove two additional strain.

abilities.name: Hybrid Physiology
abilities.description: In the wilds, does not need to make Survival checks to find acceptable food, water, or shelter.

abilities.name: Æffects: Wall of Thorns
abilities.description: May make a :hard: Æmbercraft check to have a hedge of dense thornbushes of silhouette 2 sprout from the ground at medium range; this counts as difficult terrain and inflicts 2 strain on all who cross through it.

abilities.name: Æffects: Weight of the Forest
abilities.description: Choose a target at medium range and make a :hard: Æmbercraft check to disorient that target until the end of the encounter.

gear: Garb of natural fibers: 1 defense, +2 soak
Satchel filled with assorted pieces of Æmber

abilities.name: Æmber Extractor
abilities.description: A character may make a :hard: Survival check to dig one Æmber out of a destroyed tree and may spend :triumph: to extract two Æmber per :triumph: spent this way.

weapons.name: Iron branches
weapons.notes: The difficulty for this check is always :average:

name: Deipno Spymaster

abilities.name: Informed
abilities.description: When providing assistance to friendly character who are making a knowledge skill, Skulduggery, or Streetwise check, this character instead adds :success::success::threat::threat: to the results of the check.

gear: Set of Deipno stealth emitters: 2 defense, +1 soak

abilities.name: Aerial Thief
abilities.description: May spend :triumph: when making a check to determine Initiative to steal one randomly determined item of encumbrance 2 or less from the character who generated the least :success: on their check.

abilities.name: Feed on the Fallen
abilities.description: At the end of the Eater of the Dead's turn, if at short range of one or more non-demon characters suffering Critical Injuries, may heal a number of wounds that it is suffering equal to the total number of Critical Injuries.

abilities.name: Power from the Fallen
abilities.description: While engaged with a non-demon character, increase this character's Brawn by one for each Critical Injury the non-demon character is currently suffering to a maximum of 5 (this also increases the damage of this character's claws and teach and this character's soak value).

abilities.name: Fragmented Memories
abilities.description: Add :proficiency::challenge: to social skill checks targeting this character.

abilities.name: Mutating
abilities.description: At the start of each encounter, may suffer 1 wound to gain one species feature generated at random from Table 1-8: Species Features on SotC page 47

abilities.name: Mystical Healing
abilities.description: Decrease the difficulty of all Medicine checks made within short range of a Grey Monk by one.

abilities.name: Protective Aura
abilities.description: Allies gain +1 soak while within short range of a Grey Monk; this stacks with multiple monks.

abilities.name: Drain Vigor
abilities.description: As an Incidental, at the start of their turn, characters engaged with a gurgle pool must make a :hard: Resilience check or suffer 3 strain.

abilities.name: Liquid Defenses
abilities.description: Halve the damage dealt to the pool before applying soak, unless the weapon has the Blast or Burn quality (regardless of whether the quality is activated).

abilities.name: Calm Center
abilities.description: May remove :boost: from Cool, Discipline, and Vigilance checks.

abilities.name: Blend with the Wilds
abilities.description: In wilderness areas, Kindrith Rangers gain defense 1.

abilities.name: Handmade Weapons
abilities.description: When another being uses this character's bow, it loses the Superior item quality and gains Inaccurate 3 and Unwieldy 5

abilities.name: Heat Wave
abilities.description: At the start of the their turn, characters engaged with a lava giant suffer 2 strain unless they are immune to heat.

abilities.name: Loves the Heat
abilities.description: Ignores penalties imposed by high temperatures and ignores damage inflicted by fire or fire-based attacks.

abilities.name: Can't Stop Experimenting!
abilities.description: While a Logos Researcher is present in an encounter, the GM may spend :despair: from any check to force all other characters to make a :hard: Vigilance: or Coordination check as an out-of-turn incidental; anyone who fails suffers 4 wounds and 4 strain.

abilities.name: Knowledge is Dangerous
abilities.description: Adds :success::threat: to the results of Knowledge: Science checks other characters make in the encounter.

weapons.name: Reality distorter
weapons.notes: Combat check uses Intellect instead of Agility

abilities.name: Expert Scrounger
abilities.description: While this character is present in an encounter, add :boost::boost: to checks friendly characters make to search an area.

abilities.name: Strike Back
abilities.description: May spend :threat::threat::threat: or :despair: from an engaged opponent's failed combat check against this character to inflict 3 wounds on the opponent.

abilities.name: Æmber-Do
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may spend a Story Point before making a skill check to double this character's Brawn value and require 1 fewer :advantage: to activate any item quality for that check.

abilities.name: The Path Provides
abilities.description: Whenever Makai assists on a check, the character making the check may spend :triumph: to heal all of their own strain.

abilities.name: Ka-boom!
abilities.description: May spend :triumph: on a combat check to activate the Blast item quality and have the quality affect all characters within short range of the target.

abilities.name: Animal Adversary
abilities.description: :despair: may be spent on a failed check this character makes during a turn in which they direct their animal companion to have the companion make a combat check as an out-of-turn action targeting this character; :triumph: may be spent on this combat check to also have the animal run away.

abilities.name: Ease Your Worries
abilities.description: Whenever allies at short range would suffer strain involuntarily, they suffer 2 less strain, to a minimum of 0

abilities.name: Explains Things
abilities.description: Allies at short range add :ability: to Knowledge: Æmber checks they make

abilities.name: Wondrous Aura
abilities.description: Allies within short range add :setback: to their Deception checks and :boost: to their Discipline checks.

abilities.name: Spiked Carapace
abilities.description: When targeted by a melee combat check, may spend :threat::threat::threat: or :despair: from the results to have the attacker suffer 4 wounds.

abilities.name: Frenzied Hunger
abilities.description: After making a successful combat check, may spend :triumph: to inflict an additional hit on any number of other engaged opponents, dealing base damage +1 per :success:; after doing so the neutron shark suffers 3 strain for each additional opponent hit.

abilities.name: Forest Predator
abilities.description: When in forest, may spend :advantage::advantage: from an Initiative check to make an immediate out-of-turn maneuver.

abilities.name: Challenge Accepted!
abilities.description: Once per session, may spend a Story Point to count as having 3 ranks in any skill they do not posses until the end of the encounter.

name: Quixo the 'Adventurer'
notes: Motivations: Desire (Fame), Fear (Failure), Strength (Confidence), Flaw (Recklessness). Has animal companion Archimedes

abilities.name: Exploration Maven
abilities.description: While exploring (or telling stories of his explorations), whenever Quixo recovers strain, he removes three additional strain and friendly characters within short range suffer 1 strain.

abilities.name: Not in the Memoirs
abilities.description: Whenever Quixo would suffer a Critical Injury, he may spend a Story Point to have one of his assistants within short range be incapacitated instead.

abilities.name: Belief through Power
abilities.description: Whenever an ally within short range makes a successful combat check, other allies in the encounter recover 2 strain.

abilities.name: Power through Belief
abilities.description: Allies within short range count their Brawn as 2 higher, to a maximum of 6.

abilities.name: Symbol of Faith
abilities.description: While Argus assumes his armored knightly form, Sanctum allies at medium range gain defense 1.

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.description: After making a successful combat check against a target, add :boost: to the next combat check this character makes against the same target.

weapons.name: Cybernetic augments
weapons.notes: The difficulty for this check is always :average:

abilities.name: Power from Faith
abilities.description: After making a combat check, may spend :advantage::advantage: to add 3 damage to one hit of the attack; after making an opposed social skill check may spend :advantage::advantage: to inflict 3 strain on the target.

name: Saurian Merchant

abilities.name: Seasoned Negotiator
abilities.description: Whenever the merchant would suffer strain after making or opposing a Negotiation skill check, they suffer 1 less, to a minimum of 0; when inflicting strain as part of a Negotiation skill check, they inflict one additional strain.

gear: Assortment of the most wonderous goods you've ever seen

abilities.name: Yee-hah!
abilities.description: May spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: from a success combat check using their liquid-metal lasso to inflict one hit from the weapon on one other target within short range of the original target, inflicting base damage +1 per :success:.

abilities.name: Stampede
abilities.description: For every three minions in this minion group, add :boost: to any Brawl checks.

name: Shadows Thief

abilities.name: Natural Thief
abilities.description: Once per session, may reroll one Skulduggery or Stealth check.

abilities.name: Poof!
abilities.description: Once per encounter may make an opposed Stealth versus Vigilance check against an opponent within short range to vanish from the encounter; must reappear at long range of that opponent at the start of this character's next turn.

gear: Set of customer stealth xxx: 2 defense

abilities.name: Æmberspines
abilities.description: A character may make a :hard: Survival check to extract one Æmber per  :success: and two Æmber per :triumph: spent from a freshly defeated snufflegator's spines.

abilities.name: Crushing Bite
abilities.description: May spend :triumph: from a successful Brawl check to increase the base damage of its jaws to 14.

abilities.name: Dangerous Connections
abilities.description: May spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: from a social skill check they make targeting a PC to move one Story Point from the player pool to the GM pool.

abilities.name: Never Alone
abilities.description: May spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: on checks this character makes to determine Initiative to have one additional scout appear at long range; this new scout also makes a check to determine Initiative.

abilities.name: Cruel Empathy
abilities.description: When a character within short ranged makes a check that generates :despair:, the Terror removes 1 strain.

abilities.name: For the Pain
abilities.description: When a non-demon within short range suffers a Critical Injury, may spend a Story Point to replace the result with an Agonizing Wound.

abilities.name: Terrifying Aura
abilities.description: At the start of an encounter, all opponents must make a :hard-1: fear check as an out-of-turn incidental, as per page 243 of the Genesys Core Rulebook; if there are multiple sources of fear in the encounter, the opponents only make on fear check against the most fearsome enemy.

abilities.name: Chronal Absorption
abilities.description: For every round that passes in an encounter featuring a timehog, an hour passes outside of the encounter.

abilities.name: Eating Time
abilities.description: As an action, may make an opposed Survival versus Discipline check targeting one character at short range; if successful, the timehog may perform one additional maneuver during its turns for the remainder of the encounter without suffering strain (it still may only perform two maneuvers during its turn); the target loses its free maneuver during its turn for the remainder of the encounter.

abilities.name: Friends Help Friends
abilities.description: Once per encounter as an action, may select a target within short range and one ally within medium range; the ally can make one immediate combat check against the target as an out-of-turn incidental.

abilities.name: Useful Advice
abilities.description: Once per session as an out-of-turn incidental, may spend a Story Point to allow one ally in the encounter to reroll a failed check.

abilities.name: Philosophical Paradox
abilities.description: May make an opposed Knowledge: Æmber versus Discipline check targeting a sentient being within short range to stagger the target until the end of their next turn.

abilities.name: Scamper
abilities.description: When making a check to determine Initiative, may spend :advantage::advantage: to upgrade the difficulty of combat checks made targeting them in the first round once.

abilities.name: River's Embrace
abilities.description: May spend :triumph: from a check targeting a character who is engaged with a body of water to make that character fall in.

abilities.name: Soothing Melody
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may make an :average: Charm or Coordination check; if successful, characters in the encounter remove 1 strain per :success: and :triumph: this character adds :boost: to social skill checks they make until the end of the encounter.

abilities.name: Tough to Convince
abilities.description: When another character targets this character with an opposed social skill check, the difficulty is set by this character's Brawn instead of the usual characteristic.

abilities.name: Tail Smash
abilities.description: After making a successful melee combat check, may spend :triumph: to inflict one hit dealing 6 damage on one engaged character.

abilities.name: The Legend
abilities.description: When making a skill check, may spend a Story Point to treat :advantage::advantage: as :triumph:.

abilities.name: Veteran of a Thousand Battles
abilities.description: When Ximilpix makes a check to determine Initiative order, :advantage: on the check counts as :success:.
